jd: Hi,I'm Teja from Talent Groups.I hope you're doing well!Please review the requirements below, inform us of your interest, and send us your updated resume.Role: .Net With Azure integration leadLocation: Louisville, KY - OnsiteContractJob Description•8+ yrs of experience in enterprise integration architecture and data architecture standards, frameworks, and practices.•Experience in designing software systems with various Microsoft technologies such as C#, .NET, ASP.NET, MVC, Dot NET CORE.•Experience with WCF, Web API, REST, and multi-tier distributed systems.•Knowledge of common system integration methods and technologies including Web services, SOAP, JSON, XML Schema Definition (XSD), Extensible Markup Language (XML), Business process automation and orchestration tools and software•Expertise in solution design and development, enterprise application support, in addition to strong business understanding.•Experience with the implementation of Continuous Integration practices and tooling to support automated build, delivery and regression test of application.•Proven experience in managing relationships with client IT teams and internal stakeholders.•Experience working with API’s from commercial software applications, such as CRM or ERP systems•A passion for all things tech and has a drive to experiment with new technologies to see where they can benefit the business.•Experience in a supervisory role on an integration development team in Onsite Offshore modelExcellent communication skills
